data.title: Bronislau Kaper
data.meta_description: Bronislau Kaper. Composer: Meuterei auf der Bounty. Born: February 5, 1902 in Warsaw, Poland Died: April 25, 1983 in Los Angeles, California, USA Kaper displayed musical talent as early as the age of seven when his family acquired a piano. His inclination to music led him to study both piano and composition, while also taking courses in law to satisfy his father. At twenty-one he graduated from The Chopin Music...
data.text: Born Bronislaw Kaper, his name was misread during his immigration years (the closing "w", hastily printed, was read as "u" by people not knowing Slavic names). As a result, he is often, incorrectly, referred to as "Bronislau" Kaper-- a name that does not exist and never has.
